name: plastic invaders (Lukecafc)
description: Play as the fish and move about using the arrow keys. If you eat up the plastic then you will lose health. Your health bar is in the bottom right. Collect powerups and each has different effects listed bellow. CONTROLS: right arrow - move right left arrow - move left Powerups: health - you will get 1 extra health bar (you start with five) coming soon: plastic eater - colliding with plastic no longer hurts you and you collect it, adding to your score
